item.title: [317] Czar source, Items won't appear in shops?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

Ok i got it to work as left click, apparently i’ve put it as firstclick but thats fine for now, I can’t get wanneshop 1 to work but wanneshop 2 + 3 do so i’ll change wanneshop 1 to a npc i wont need and hide him

Thanks for your ‘help’

item.title: [317] Czar source, Items won't appear in shops?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Check all of your wanneshop’s and all of the shops in your shops.cfg file. Make sure that your rune shop is the only one that is identified as 1.

item.source: [317] Czar source, Items won't appear in shops?

item.title: [317] Czar source, Items won't appear in shops?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

Hey i’ve just started tryin to code and i just put my first shop in with the following codes in:

Shops.cfg :

shop = 1 Runes 1 1 554 1000 555 1000 556 1000 557 1000 558 1000 559 1000 560 500 561 500 562 500 563 500 564 500 565 500 566 500

Autospawn.cfg

spawn = 553 3315 2802 0 0 0 0 0 2 Rune Shop

Client.java

if (NPCID == 553) { // Rune Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
}
else if (NPCID == 553) { // Rune Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;
}

Note. The shop appears but with nothing inside

Any help is appreciated

Read full topic
